description:
To ensure the creation of a new successful venture based on utilizing market validation for product development and initial business model creation.
The purpose of this course is to:
• Help students understand the process, challenges, risks and rewards of developing a new product
• Equip them with the tools required to take their identified market opportunity and translate it into product development and a sustainable business model
• Improve the chances of success in starting a business
title: Product Validation
prerequisite:
(1) BSP1702 Legal Environment of Business
(2) BSP1703 Managerial Economics; or BSP1707 Managerial Economics: Exposure
(3) BSP2701 Global Economy
